Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Trap = Tool.Handle
Tool.Enabled = true
local vCharacter local vPlayer local numberOfTraps local screenGui local buzzer
local myTorso local myHumanoid
local trapCFrame = CFrame.new()
function checkTrap(trap) if trap and trap.Parent == nil then numberOfTraps = Tool:FindFirstChild("NumberOfTraps") if numberOfTraps and numberOfTraps.Value < 12 then numberOfTraps.Value = numberOfTraps.Value + 1 end end end
function onActivated() if not Tool.Enabled then return end numberOfTraps = Tool:FindFirstChild("NumberOfTraps") if numberOfTraps then if numberOfTraps.Value <= 0 then buzzer = Tool:FindFirstChild("NoTrapsBuzzer") if buzzer then buzzer:Play() end return end end numberOfTraps.Value = numberOfTraps.Value - 1 Tool.Enabled = false vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not myTorso or not myHumanoid then return end vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if not vPlayer then return end
local fire = Trap:FindFirstChild("Fire") if fire then fire.Enabled = false end
local clonedTrap = Trap:Clone()
bodyGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") bodyGyro.P = 10000 bodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(bodyGyro.P, bodyGyro.P, bodyGyro.P) --bodyGyro.cframe = (myTorso.CFrame + (myTorso.CFrame.lookVector * 2.0)) * CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2, 0, 0) bodyGyro.cframe = trapCFrame bodyGyro.Parent = clonedTrap
clonedTrap.Parent = Workspace clonedTrap.CanCollide = true clonedTrap.Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(.4,.4,.4) Trap.Transparency = 1.0
local cloneScript = Tool.TrapScript:Clone() cloneScript.Parent = clonedTrap
local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Value = vPlayer creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Parent = cloneScript
cloneScript.Disabled = false
wait(0.25) clonedTrap.AncestryChanged:connect(function() checkTrap(clonedTrap) end) wait(4.5) if fire then fire.Enabled = false end Trap.Transparency = 0.0 Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
numberOfTraps = Tool:FindFirstChild("NumberOfTraps")
screenGui = Instance.new("ScreenGui") screenGui.Name = "TrapsGui" if vPlayer then screenGui.Parent = vPlayer.PlayerGui end
frame = Instance.new("Frame") frame.Name = "TrapContainer" frame.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0.75, 0) frame.Size = UDim2.new(0, 75, 0, 75) frame.Parent = screenGui frame.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0
image = Instance.new("ImageLabel") image.Name = "Trap" image.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=63216452" image.Parent = frame image.Size = UDim2.new(0, 75, 0, 75) image.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0
text = Instance.new("TextLabel") text.Text = numberOfTraps.Value
numberOfTraps.Changed:connect(function() text.Text = numberOfTraps.Value end) text.Position = UDim2.new(0.75, 0, 0.75, 0) text.Size = UDim2.new(0.5, 0, 0.5, 0) text.Parent = frame text.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 text.TextColor = BrickColor.new("Deep orange") text.FontSize = 7 end
function onUnequipped() Trap.Transparency = 0.0 if screenGui then screenGui:Remove() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local Trap = script.Parent local debounce = false local vCharacter local torso
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local creatorTag
if Trap.CFrame.lookVector:Dot(Vector3.new(0, 1, 0)) > 0 then Trap.CFrame = Trap.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, -math.pi, 0) end
wait(1.5) Trap.Transparency = 0.9
local burnSound
function burnAWhile(humanoid, torso) local duration = 7 if humanoid and torso then fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Parent = torso fire.Heat = -1 fire.Size = 5 while duration > 0 do duration = duration - 1 humanoid:TakeDamage(7) wait(0.5) end if fire then fire:Remove() end end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid) if humanoid then creatorTag = script:FindFirstChild("creator") if creatorTag then creatorTag.Parent = humanoid debris:AddItem(creator, 2.5) end end end
local lightningPart = Instance.new("Part") lightningPart.Name = "Lightning" lightningPart.FormFactor = 3 lightningPart.Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 10) lightningPart.Anchored = true
local lightningMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") lightningMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) lightningMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=65419828" lightningMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=65419395" lightningMesh.Parent = lightningPart
function summonBoltShield() vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if vCharacter == nil or vPlayer == nil then return end
for i = 1, 16 do local pos = CFrame.Angles(0, i * math.pi/8, 0) * torso.CFrame.lookVector
local spawnPos = torso.Position spawnPos = spawnPos + (pos * 4.25)
lightningProjectile = lightningPart:Clone() lightningProjectile.Name = "rope" lightningProjectile.CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + pos) * CFrame.Angles(-0.872664626, 0, 0) local floatForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") floatForce.force = Vector3.new(0, lightningPart:GetMass() * 196.1, 0) floatForce.Parent = lightningProjectile lightningProjectile.Velocity = pos * 75.0 lightningProjectile.Parent = game.Workspace --lightningProjectile.Touched:connect(function(hit) blow(lightningProjectile, boltDamage, hit) end) debris:addItem(lightningProjectile, 4) end end
function trapThem(trap, hit) if trap == nil or hit == nil or hit.Parent == nil then return end local humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and not debounce then vCharacter = humanoid.Parent debounce = true humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0.0 torso = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") if torso then torso.Anchored = true trap.CFrame = torso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2, 0, 0) trap.Anchored = true end --if trap:FindFirstChild("Mesh") then trap.Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.8, 0.8, 1.3) end trap.Transparency = 0.0 --wait(1.5) if trap:FindFirstChild("Fire") then burnSound = script:FindFirstChild("BurnSound") if burnSound then burnSound:Play() end summonBoltShield() --trap.Fire.Size = 20 end tagHumanoid(humanoid) humanoid:TakeDamage(1) wait(.1) humanoid:TakeDamage(2) wait(.2) humanoid:TakeDamage(1) wait(.1) humanoid:TakeDamage(2) wait(.2) humanoid:TakeDamage(1) wait(.1) humanoid:TakeDamage(2) wait(.2) humanoid:TakeDamage(1) wait(.1)
humanoid:TakeDamage(1) wait(.1) humanoid:TakeDamage(2) wait(.2) humanoid:TakeDamage(1) wait(.1) humanoid:TakeDamage(2) wait(.2) humanoid:TakeDamage(1) wait(.1)
humanoid:TakeDamage(1) wait(.1) humanoid:TakeDamage(2) wait(.2) humanoid:TakeDamage(1) wait(.1) humanoid:TakeDamage(2) wait(.2) humanoid:TakeDamage(1) wait(.1) humanoid:TakeDamage(2) wait(.2) humanoid:TakeDamage(1) wait(.1)
humanoid:TakeDamage(1) wait(.1) humanoid:TakeDamage(2) wait(.2) humanoid:TakeDamage(1) wait(.1) humanoid:TakeDamage(2) wait(.2) humanoid:TakeDamage(1) wait(.1) humanoid:TakeDamage(2) wait(.2) humanoid:TakeDamage(1) wait(.3)
if trap then trap:Remove() end --coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() burnAWhile(humanoid, torso) end)) if humanoid then humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end if torso then torso.Anchored = false end debounce = false end end
Trap.Touched:connect(function(hit) trapThem(Trap, hit) end) wait(75) if Trap then Trap:Remove() end if script then script:Remove() end
